response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and efficiency of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I estimate its worth to be around $800,000 to you. Considering this, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $750,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent investment opportunity. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer or if you need any further information about the product. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 750000}
